name: Test Your Strength: To the Moon
name_original: Test Your Strength: To the Moon
description:
This game is for the 20 second jam!

To quick restart the game press T

You're an angry dude with a hammer, what can go wrong? Make the person on the other end of your hammer feel your wrath by sending them to the moon.

The main goal of the game is simple, Spam the E key as fast as you can for 20 seconds to increase your score.

What score you get at the end of the 20 seconds will determine how high the other character gets launched. 

Shoot for the moon by getting 175 points or more!
